channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump Eyes Greenland, and Europe Figures Its Best Bet Is a Negotiation
item.description: European officials were stunned that President Trump restated his desire for Greenland after a yearlong effort to dissuade him, according to diplomats...

item.title: Six People Are Fatally Shot in Mississippi, Sheriff Says
item.description: In a social media post, the Clay County sheriff said that “multiple innocent lives were lost” and that one person was in custody.

item.title: Trump wants to cap credit card interest rates at 10%. But such limits could harm consumers, experts warn
item.description: On Friday, President Donald Trump called for a one-year cap on credit card interest rates at 10%, effective Jan. 20.

item.title: Investor Michael Burry reveals options bet against Oracle

item.title: No, Trump can’t use example of fraud in Minnesota to block childcare subisidies to 5 blue states, judge says
item.description: The five states say they receive a total of more than $10 billion a year from the programs.

item.title: Congress debates what to do about ICE after giving Trump billions of funding to expand the program
item.description: “The videos I’ve seen from Minneapolis yesterday are deeply disturbing,” said Sen. Lisa Murkowski, R-Alaska, in a statement.

item.title: Minneapolis is so unsafe in the ICE shooting aftermath that families can choose remote learning for their kids for the next month
item.description: That Minneapolis, a district of nearly 30,000 students, would willingly offer remote learning again suggests a new level of fear,

item.title: Acquired Tastes
item.description: The dream of cohabitating with a group of friends is an attractive fantasy, but we can benefit from its lessons, regardless of our living situation.

item.title: Why Putin Went Quiet When Challenged by Trump Over Venezuela
item.description: For the Russian leader, courting President Trump to secure a favorable resolution in Ukraine, and possibly more, is far more important.

item.title: How Delcy Rodríguez, Venezuela’s Leader, Became Vital to Trump’s Plans for the Country
